title: Remote Simulation-Based Clinical Competency Enhancement Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in an environment where digital devices (tablets/PCs) are provided, learners engage in pre-learning via LMS followed by simulations and debriefings on real-time video platforms

learning_goals: In severe patient management scenarios, clinical decision-making can be performed with 80% accuracy using remote simulation.
Healthcare professionals' emotional competencies can be analyzed on a three-level scale using virtual patient assessment tools.
Combining asynchronous LMS learning with synchronous debriefing enables the identification and correction of three or more clinical errors.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
